description:
Our heroes converge on the throne room after contending with a hall of enchanted mirrors and Gokudo`s abortive attempt to throw in with their enemies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Escucha el último de mis deseos.
Oresama no Saigo no Negai o Kiite Kure! no Koto
オレ様の最後の願いを聞いてくれ! のこと
